abstract: Defense lawyers at penalty phase in trial of convicted Boston Marathon bomber Dzhokhar A Tsarnaev call as witnesses his teachers and friends, some of whom offer positive accounts of Tsarnaev as a child.
lead_paragraph: Defense lawyers at the penalty phase in the trial of the man convicted in the Boston Marathon bombing called as witnesses Wednesday a series of his teachers and friends, some of whom offered glowing accounts about his young life.

headline.main: Massachusetts: Witnesses Recall a Young Dzhokhar Tsarnaev
headline.print_headline: Massachusetts: Witnesses Recall a Young Dzhokhar Tsarnaev

snippet: Defense lawyers at the penalty phase in the trial of the man convicted in the Boston Marathon bombing called as witnesses Wednesday a series of his teachers and friends, some of whom offered glowing accounts about his young life.
